name: Bubbet Defender
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 84: Bubbles

Defend Bub from invading Poppers!

Instructions: 

Press [Z] to fire Bubbets at the incoming Poppers.

Each shot shrinks Bub, and it's Game Over if he gets too small.

Hitting Poppers rewards you with more air so watch your aim, but some will take multiple hits!

Update: Made some minor changes to early levels to get to the action sooner

PSST: I heard by pressing ↑ + [X] on the title screen lets you get straight to the hardest mode, if you dare!
